text:
@realDonaldTrump No. You were not right.

You're NEVER right.

Look at the recent info out about hydroxychloroquine, the malaria drug you hailed as a coronavirus  killer, 

Two controlled trials show it has NO beneficial effect  for COVID-19 patients.

https://t.co/aODNGRc6g4
